nodes.text: The Circle Maintenance Corridor was a roadway near the House Trader's Circle in King's Pass on the planet Alderaan. It was used primarily for maintenance and facilities for the nearby market, though House Rist took over the roadway and the facilities during the Alderaan Civil War. Doctor Eckard Lokin retired to an estate at the southern end of the Corridor.

The Circle Maintenance Corridor first appeared as a Heroic area in King's Pass on Alderaan in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The buildings in the area were moved around to accommodate a new house belonging to Doctor Lokin in the 2015 Digital Expansion, Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire.
